channel.title: Notes on Nothing Owned
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Nothing Owned

item.title: A Citrus Tree
item.description: It was an Autumn, I brought in a citrus tree.

item.title: Time Long Past
item.description: What was once in a profound obsession may never strike him. Stars in the distant sky may never arouse the wistful memory of his young age. Presently he would not torment himself through a sleepless night in searching of the time long past.
